breadcrumbs.title: Amend or refund a driving charge

title.title: Amend or refund a driving charge

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["You can amend or apply for a refund for some Congestion Charges, Ultra Low Emission Zone (ULEZ) charges and Low Emission Zone (LEZ) charges."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
It costs £2.50 to amend a charge and £10 to refund one. (There is no cost to refund a LEZ charge.)
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Your receipt number","The start date of the charge","The number plate (Vehicle Registration Mark) of the vehicle you have paid for"]}
You will also need a credit or debit card to pay for any amendments.
Single day charges can't be refunded , apart from LEZ charges.
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Amendments can start from today's date","Refunds are only available for dates in the future - you can't apply for a refund for today or dates in the past"]}
If you paid a charge when signed into your account, you must also sign in to amend or refund it.
